sources.title: The Big Trail (1930)
sources.description: Young scout Breck Coleman leads a wagon train along the dangerous trail to Oregon as he tries to get the affection of the beautiful pioneer Ruth Cameron and plans his revenge on the harsh scoundrels who murdered a friend of his in the past. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-big-trail-1930/

metadata.Plot: Breck leads a wagon train of pioneers through Indian attack, storms, deserts, swollen rivers, down cliffs and so on while looking for the murder of a trapper and falling in love with Ruth.
metadata.Writer: Hal G. Evarts, Marie Boyle, Jack Peabody
metadata.Actors: John Wayne, Marguerite Churchill, El Brendel
